snippet.title: A Turnabout Called Justice [FT] Part 1: The Gramarye Revival
snippet.description:
[A Visual Novelty First-Time Playthrough]

Ahem something something Justice I totally didn't forget to change the description nopenope-
-----------------------------------------
A Turnabout Called Justice, by drvonkitty/mercurialSK!

Months after the conclusion of the trial of Athena Cykes, Trucy Wright has finally regained the Gramarye Rights and plans a brand new show to revive the Gramarye Miracle. What follows is a devastating accident-turned-murder, leaving it up to Apollo Justice and Athena Cykes to find justice or doom the legal system to darkness forever.

Find it on Court Records here! https://www.forums.court-records.net/viewtopic.php?f=36&t=32332
